content: This sounds like you clicking the "power off" in Windows 10. Lock leaves the OS running - when you next want to access your Windows account you must log in again.
creator: wsmwk

content: Hi Spector. Suggestions like this are best posted at https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird where they can be discussed and voted.
creator: wsmwk

content: Filters only run automatically on the Inbox, but you can define a filter for other folders that's run manually.
creator: sfhowes

content: What do you have for the timezone in Settings/Calendar?
creator: sfhowes

content:
The settings in calender are set to windows .. it does the same if I set it to Austalia/Perth

However, if I use another timezone, eg Australia/Melbourne .. it works perfectly .. I put an event in and it appears at the correct time in SOGO, etc .. and if I change the timezone back to windows or Perth in the calendar settings, the event is correct.

It seems to be purely when creating a new event based on the Australia/Perth timezone :(
creator: mal8

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
creator: @next

content: In this section of the forum we speak Italian. For english support -> https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/new/thunderbird/form
